title: Manage Stock Transfer Between Warehouses
description: A distribution center on the East Coast is low on stock for an item, while the West Coast center has a surplus. An agent must arrange a stock transfer.

tasks.description: Identify the inventory imbalance between the two warehouses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms one warehouse has a surplus and the other has a deficit.

tasks.description: Create a stock transfer order in the inventory management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an order to move 500 units from the West Coast to the East Coast.

tasks.description: Arrange for freight transportation for the transfer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books a truck to move the goods between warehouses.
